name: The 'Hole'some Interruption
description:
The 'Hole'some interruption is a top-down shooter made for the Brackeys gamejam 2020.1 (3rd Brackeys gamejam).

This is my first time ever participating in a gamejam, so please give me some constructive citicism with in depth information on how to improve.

I have been working with Unity for around a month by the time of uploading the game, so take it with a grain of salt if you find some bugs or something.
